form.warning: Warning: The URL configured here will receive events that contain information about repository names and namespaces and therefore may reveal information about your repositories, even though the configured user in the Jenkins server may not be permitted to see those repositories.
form.disableRepositoryConfigurationHelp: Do not allow repository owners to configure jenkins hooks.
form.disableGitTriggerHelp:
Disable trigger for git repositories. 
Note: The git trigger requires version 1.1.14 or above of the jenkins git plugin.
form.disableMercurialTriggerHelp:
Disable trigger for mercurial repositories. 
Note: The mercurial trigger requires version 1.38 or above of the jenkins mercurial plugin.
form.disableEventTriggerHelp:
Disable trigger for SCM-Manager events. 
Note: This events are only processed if the Jenkins-SCM-Manager-Plugin is installed. 
The events informs Jenkins about changes regarding branches, tags or pull requests.

form.projectHelp: The name of the Jenkins project.
form.csrfHelp: Should be checked if your Jenkins instance is csrf protected.
form.usernameHelp: Username which is used for the authentication on the Jenkins ci server.
form.apiTokenHelp: The API Token of the user. This token is used for authentication. You could get your API Token from your Jenkins Server at http://yourjenkinsserver/jenkins/user/username/configure.
form.parameterHelpText:
The build job parameters will be send on each request.
Jenkins can only process parameters which are defined in the build job.
Parameter names are case sensitive!
form.parameterNameHelp:
The name of the parameter.
It must match the defined build job parameter name in jenkins exactly.
form.parameterValueHelp:
The value of the parameter:
 - Use "true" or "false" as boolean parameters
 - To use a Run Parameter, the value should be in the format "jobname#buildNumber"
 - You may use variable parameters from context formatted like ${repository.name}

jenkins.description: May modify the global Jenkins configuration

*.description: May modify the repository specific Jenkins configuration for all repositories (if not disabled globally)

jenkins.description: May modify the repository specific jenkins configurations (if not disabled globally)
